issue.title: Feature "visualization" in ressource type
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

If disactivated in BE, the feature "visualization" is not available which is OK.
But role "visualization manager" remains available under the ressource in FE.

It should not be the case.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Sorry bad question...end of the week ;-)

-Hi Xavier,-

-I guess you mean that "visualization" action must be hidden in management list of frontoffice ?-

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Thanks to Steering Committee members to vote on such feature...
